title: Cybersquad
overview: When they aren't getting in trouble with their school management, KD, Rocky, Uzi, and Tia are badass teenagers who help the police capture the most notorious criminals and hackers from their own secret cyber-den. They are young, they are smart, and they are here to use their high-tech skills and arsenal of gizmos to make the world a safer place. Follow the adventures of CyberSquad as they blur the lines between the online and the offline worlds.
